casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. EBERHARDT
v.
JANIK 2018-1367 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 28, 2018 O'CONNOR, C.J., and O'DONNELL, KENNEDY, FRENCH, FISCHER, DEWINE, and DEGENARO, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

Sua sponte, cause dismissed. Petitioner's emergency motion for bond and request for alternative writs denied.
